title: pre game/client bug
body:
When i q for a game everything is good untill after the champ select screen. when the client is supposed to open up  the game
it re-opens the client and says "skip waiting for stats" which i click which should allow me to see a reconnect button
but there is nothing and it even allows me to open up a new lobby.... i tried a full repair and launched my game same issue
but with a free 5 20 min q timer as the missed games appear in my match history after they remake. i have screenshots which show me in a lobby with date/time while my client is supposed to
be loading me into another game.

couldn't create a ticket because it told me to login while being logged in. relogged etc multiple times same issue

(20 min q timer was on my main, had to log onto this account so i could try & get screnshots with date time showing)

replies.body:
Follow up:
I have been talking to riot support on twitter and have gone through alot of different tasks to resolve the issue, will now be moving onto logs to try to resolve the issue
https://imgur.com/a/FXlya

follow up:

same issue arose. had 2 bugsplats then my client was gone again.... gave it another 2 full repairs but still broken. can i please have some support as i cant make a ticket either...
Login for the support site  is separate from boards. Hit login (you may have to logout of boards then back into support) and you'll be able to submit.

tried what you said and it didn't work :/ (tried logging in 5 different times)
kept on reverting me back and foward between the "please log in" as shown 
in screenshot and the login screen for league support.

the client was working fine for a while then the glitch happend again giving me another 5 20min q timers on this acc (Main)

For your client, try doing a clean reinstall with the Hextech Repair Tool: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

For support, try opening the support page in an incognito/private tab on your browser, or trying logging out of boards before trying to log into support.

I had a read around for issues, my league was originally installed on my E drive so i uninstalled it and did a whole new re install to C drive where it normally is when first installing. was working fine for a while then issue happened again, I did a reinstall from the in game initiate repair and from hextech repair tool. I then tried to login to make a ticket through incognito and it doesn't work :/ i have also had bugsplats from the client that have been sent.

https://imgur.com/a/AKqvh (picture of incognito mode with same issue on login)

is there anyone from riot who specializes in client side bugs etc who get get in contact with me to help resolve this issue, had to go through 2x of the 5 20minute q timers due to this bug. I linked this url in the bugsplat but is there anywhere or any logs I should know about that i can possibly send to help solve the issue

To clarify, you have tried logging into support (in incognito or otherwise) while logged *out* of the website/boards/everything else? The support page has a separate login, and there has been a recent conflict with the two logins.

If you did that and are still having issues, you can reach out to the Support Twitter: https://twitter.com/RiotSupport and they should be able to help you more.

You could also try updating your graphics card drivers and your DirectX (https://support.microsoft.com/en-au/help/179113/how-to-install-the-latest-version-of-directx) which may resolve your issue.

If you have any other games running at the time I would recommend closing them as some games can cause DirectX conflicts. If you run in fullscreen mode I would also recommend not alt tabbing in the loading screen as this can also cause resource conflicts.

my graphics card drivers and direct X are updated to the latest version and the screenshot was in incognito mode. I'm not sure what to do as I've reinstalled league using hextech repair tool but my account has 5 20 min timers. do i have to play them out even if its directly caused by a bug. like I've played 10 20minute q timers out but 15.... another hour and half... due to a bug which is out of my hands..

after reinstalling and having a fresh client, I played a game on my alt account and the glitch happened again.

I'm afraid I don't know what else could be causing your issue. So long as you keep playing with a known issue you'll keep getting Leaver Busters (the 20min timers) so I wouldn't recommend it unless you can play on a different PC or something until you can get in touch with support.

Was in a game when this glitch happend and couldn't reconnect. after reinstalling league from ingame, then doing a full reinstall from hextech. then found out that https://imgur.com/a/NSJc4

I literally cant go through 3 of these cause of this like.......
i have gone through 2 but 3...

Follow up:

i managed to fix it by doing another full repair but i am sure that after a few games the same will happen, can only wait and see
